title: Login page not working
description: Users are unable to log in with correct credentials.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Stripe payment fails with a 500 server error.

title: Slow dashboard loading
description: Dashboard takes more than 30 seconds to load.

title: Mobile view broken
description: UI elements overlap in mobile layout.

title: Email notifications not sent
description: Users do not receive confirmation emails.

title: Search not returning results
description: Search query returns empty results even with valid input.

title: Profile picture upload issue
description: Uploading profile images fails with a 413 error.

title: App crash on iOS
description: iOS users report app crashes after login.

title: Forgot password link broken
description: Clicking reset password link leads to 404 page.

title: Data sync issue
description: Data is not syncing across devices.

title: Inventory not updating
description: Stock levels not reducing after purchase.

title: Two-factor authentication failed
description: OTP not being delivered to users.

title: Chat support not loading
description: Live chat widget fails to load on the website.
